name: Salesforce Sales Cloud
price: Variable pricing based on selected features and number of users
description: The world's #1 CRM platform tailored for sales teams. Streamline your sales processes, close deals faster, and grow your business with Salesforce Sales Cloud.

free.name: Lead Management
free.description: Capture, track, and manage leads efficiently throughout the sales pipeline.

paid.name: Opportunity Management
paid.description: Track and prioritize opportunities, forecast sales, and manage deal stages.

paid.name: Sales Analytics
paid.description: Gain insights into sales performance, track key metrics, and make data-driven decisions.

paid.name: Mobile Sales App
paid.description: Access Salesforce Sales Cloud on-the-go with a powerful mobile app for iOS and Android.
